abstract: Separate fixed- and floating-point interleaved buffers into discrete planar buffers.

# Functions that deinterleave noninteger interleaved buffers

**API Collection**

Separate fixed- and floating-point interleaved buffers into discrete planar buffers.

## Deinterleaving 32-bit interleaved buffers

- **vImageConvert_ChunkyToPlanarF(_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:)**: Deinterleaves a floating-point 32-bit-per-channel interleaved buffer with an arbitrary number of channels into the corresponding number of 32-bit planar buffers.

## Deinterleaving 32-bit three-channel interleaved buffers

- **vImageConvert_RGBFFFtoPlanarF(_:_:_:_:_:)**: Deinterleaves a floating-point 32-bit-per-channel, 3-channel interleaved buffer into three floating-point 32-bit planar buffers.

## Deinterleaving 32-bit four-channel interleaved buffers

- **vImageConvert_ARGBFFFFtoPlanar8(_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:)**: Deinterleaves a floating-point 32-bit-per-channel, 4-channel interleaved buffer into four 8-bit planar buffers.
- **vImageConvert_BGRXFFFFToPlanarF(_:_:_:_:_:)**: Deinterleaves a floating-point 32-bit-per-channel, 4-channel interleaved buffer into three floating-point 32-bit planar buffers and discards the last channel.
- **vImageConvert_XRGBFFFFToPlanarF(_:_:_:_:_:)**: Deinterleaves a floating-point 32-bit-per-channel, 4-channel interleaved buffer into three floating-point 32-bit planar buffers and discards the first channel.
- **vImageConvert_ARGBFFFFtoPlanarF(_:_:_:_:_:_:)**: Deinterleaves a floating-point 32-bit-per-channel, 4-channel interleaved buffer into four floating-point 38-bit planar buffers.

## Converting between interleaved and planar formats

- **Functions that interleave integer planar buffers**: Combine discrete integer planar buffers into an interleaved buffer.
- **Functions that interleave noninteger planar buffers**: Combine discrete fixed- and floating-point planar buffers into an interleaved buffer.
- **Functions that deinterleave integer interleaved buffers**: Separate integer interleaved buffers into discrete planar buffers.
